ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( HWS_Damaged_HW_RepairDiscount__c > 1.0, HWS_Damaged_HW_RepairDiscount__c < 0.0, HWS_Damaged_HW_RepairDiscount2__c > 1.0, HWS_Damaged_HW_RepairDiscount2__c < 0.0, HWS_Damaged_HW_ReplacementDiscount__c > 1.0, HWS_Damaged_HW_ReplacementDiscount__c < 0.0, HWS_HW_AssessmentDiscount__c > 1.0, HWS_HW_AssessmentDiscount__c < 0.0, HWS_HW_ReplacementDiscount__c > 1.0, HWS_HW_ReplacementDiscount__c < 0.0, HWS_Unreturned_Part_Discount__c > 1.0, HWS_Unreturned_Part_Discount__c < 0.0, HWS_Repacking_HW_PackingDiscount__c > 1.0, HWS_Repacking_HW_PackingDiscount__c < 0.0, HWS_Documentation_Discount__c > 1.0, HWS_Documentation_Discount__c < 0.0 )
